ur_rna.Utilities.prefs

Class FilePreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.prefs.Preferences
      • java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferences
        • ur_rna.Utilities.prefs.FilePreferences
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilePreferences.RootNode

    public class FilePreferences
extends java.util.prefs.AbstractPreferences
    Preferences implementation that stores to a user-defined file.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FilePreferences.Factory
      PreferencesFactory implementation that stores the preferences in an XML file.

      • nodePrefix

        public java.lang.String nodePrefix()
        Returns the absolute path and ensures that it ends with a slash (/) For child nodes this is the same as absolutePath() + '/' but for the root node it is just '/'.
